tweet: We're seeing $crypto advertisements at major sports events.  Musicians accepting $BTC and other crypto for their music.  Fortnite accepting $XMR for their online merchandise store.  Tinder accepting crypto for premium subscriptions.  We're early.  This is how it starts.

The Monero and Zcash communities should talk to each other more.  For example, Monero's "burning bug" ( https://t.co/1UYXD2ktIG) was known as "faerie gold vulnerability" in Zerocash at least 3 years earlier ( https://t.co/Msjm9912c8), and fixed before Zcash went live.
